SELECT CC.seq as CCseq ,CC.seqChar as CCseqChar ,CC.codeName as CCcodeName ,CC.codeNameEng as CCcodeNameEng ,CC.useYn as CCuseYn ,CC.sort as CCsort ,CC.regDate as CCregDate ,CC.delDate as CCdelDate ,CC.modDate as CCmodDate ,CC.commonCodeGroup_seq as CCcommonCodeGroup_seq ,CCG.seq as CCGseq ,CCG.seqChar as CCGseqChar ,CCG.groupName as CCGgroupName ,CCG.useYn as CCGuseYn ,CCG.delYn as CCGdelYn
ORDER BY CC.seq ASC

SELECT CC.seq as CCseq ,CC.seqChar as CCseqChar ,CC.codeName as CCcodeName ,CC.codeNameEng as CCcodeNameEng ,CC.useYn as CCuseYn ,CC.sort as CCsort ,CC.regDate as CCregDate ,CC.delDate as CCdelDate ,CC.modDate as CCmodDate ,CC.commonCodeGroup_seq as CCcommonCodeGroup_seq ,CCG.seq as CCGseq ,CCG.groupName as CCGgroupName ,CCG.useYn as CCGuseYn ,CCG.delYn as CCGdelYn FROM commonCode CC INNER JOIN commonCodeGroup CCG on CC.commonCodeGroup_seq = CCG.seq WHERE 1=1 AND CC.seq = #{CCseq} ORDER BY CC.seq ASC

SELECT DISTINCT CCG.groupName AS CCGgroupName ,CCG.seq AS CCGseq ,CC.commonCodeGroup_seq AS CCcommonCodeGroup_seq FROM commonCodeGroup CCG LEFT JOIN commonCode CC on CC.commonCodeGroup_seq = CCG.seq WHERE 1=1 AND CCG.delYn = 0 AND CCG.useYn = 1
SELECT CC.seq AS CCseq ,CC.codeName AS CCcodeName ,CC.commonCodeGroup_seq AS CCGseq FROM commonCode CC WHERE 1=1 AND delYn = 0 AND useYn = 1
